content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -25.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to the power network and has no input liquid. The boiler is out of fuel and has no input liquid as well.

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
The lab is designed to process automation science packs but is currently not receiving power.

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
The assembling machine is set to create automation science packs but is currently not receiving power and lacks the necessary resources (copper plate and iron gear wheel).

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to connect boiler to offshore pump
- Ensure there are no blockages in the path between the boiler and offshore pump before attempting to connect pipes.

### Errors when connecting steam engine to boiler
- Check for placement blockages before trying to connect pipes from the steam engine to the boiler.

### Errors related to power connections
- Ensure that electric poles are not already occupied before attempting to place a new electric pole. Remove any existing entities at the target position before placing a new one.

### Errors when entities are not receiving power
- Verify that all power connections are correctly established and that there are no interruptions in the power network.
